comment_body: I honestly wanted more at the end. This is a very good story! Thank you!
Great job! I'd love to read more.
Wow!! I really liked this one.. like a lot. Kinda sad it ended 😂😂
I kinda want to know what happened to the son and what happened at the party.
Thank YOU for reading and commenting, it makes me very happy :) :)
Thank you! I'll write some more about single moms making deals with the devil, you could say I'm a bit of an expert in that area  :D ;D
Thank you 🙏 I’m sure we’ll come across the devil and his deals soon enough, he’s a pretty busy fellow 😎😎
Well, nothing good, I can tell you that much👹👹😄
